channel.title: Testscape help
channel.description:
I need help with:
[ul][li]Making my shops work, like wildtrain, instead of fish here[/li] [li]Making my ancients work[/li] [li]When i type ::players a screen comes up with whose on[/li] [li]Making my monsters drop items[/li][/ul]
Thanks in advance
Will Rep anyone that helps me with all[br][size=1]Posted at: August 24, 2006, 12:08:50 PM[/size][hr]bump plz help, any help will be apreicated

item.title: Testscape help
item.dc:creator: @disconnect disconnect
item.description:
@disconnect wrote:

For your ::wildtrain shops to work, find this -

spawn = 1315 3244 3519 0 3246 3521 3242 3517 2 Fish Monger spawn = 1658 3253 3400 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Robe Store Owner spawn = 682 3243 3519 0 3243 3519 3243 3519 2 Armor Salesman spawn = 683 3242 3519 0 3242 3519 3242 3519 2 Weapon Salesman spawn = 569 2658 3310 0 2660 3312 2657 3308 2 Silver Merchant spawn = 851 2663 3312 0 2665 3313 2661 3309 2 Gnome Waiter

and move it to somewhere at the top, I put it below the varrock armour shop. Full ancients, copy the ice barrage code, change the details, there’s probably a few Tuts on it, ::players should be there already, for your monsters to drop, screw around with your NPCdrops.cfg file, the 1-5 droptype line is how often they drop it - 1 meaning almost never, 5 meaning almost certain.

Read full topic
